scripts.agents_stop_running: docker ps --filter name=_agent --filter status=running -aq | xargs docker stop
scripts.agents_stop: docker ps --filter name=_agent -aq | xargs docker rm --force
scripts.hardhat_build: pushd hardhat && docker build -t hardhat . && popd
scripts.hardhat_stop: docker ps --filter name=_net -aq | xargs docker rm --force
scripts.typechain_build: pushd ../../typescript/typechain && npm i && npm run build && npm link && popd && npm link @nomad-xyz/contracts
scripts.deploy_build: pushd ../../typescript/nomad-deploy && npm i && npm link @nomad-xyz/contracts && npm run build && npm link && popd && npm link @nomad-xyz/deploy
scripts.nomad_tests_build_and_link: pushd ../../typescript/nomad-tests && npm i && npm link && popd && npm link @nomad-xyz/test
scripts.sdk_build: pushd ../../typescript/nomad-provider && npm i && npm run build && npm link && popd && npm link @nomad-xyz/sdk
scripts.cleanup: npm run hardhat_stop && npm run agents_stop && npm run agents_clean
scripts.build_libraries: npm run typechain_build && npm run deploy_build && npm run sdk_build && npm run nomad_tests_build_and_link
scripts.build: npm i && npm run hardhat_build && npm run nomad_tests_build && npm run agents_build
